comment: Two ways to express "the sum of ` A ( j , k ) ` over the triangular region ` M <_ j ` , ` M <_ k ` , ` j + k <_ N ` ". (Contributed by NM, 31-Dec-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Apr-2016.)
